descriptionHtml:
If you\'re like me, you loved the look of the Dark Brotherhood gear, but felt a bit disheartened that you couldn\'t enchant them with your own amazing enchants that you worked so hard to learn.

If your\'e a high level enchanter and like your Dark Brotherhood aesthetic, this mod is for you.

This simple mod adds purchasable, completely disenchanted Dark Brotherhood gear to the game. Each piece is sold by Babette inside the Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary. These pieces have no enchantments built into them and are enchantable by any enchanter. The base values have been reduced to half of their enchanted form. She\'s got several spare outfits in stock, so go nuts, buy a pair for your friends and enchant to your heart\'s content.

Also includes a purchasable Redguard variant of the Dark Brotherhood gear.

Version 0.5.2
--------------------------------
* Updated an issue where the old enchanted text still appeared on the Brotherhood Gloves.
author: Fallina
